ca.ualberta.taskr

Class AcceptBidFragment

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.AcceptBidFragment

  • public class AcceptBidFragment

    Fragment that allows Task Requesters to accept or decline a bid on one of tasks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accept(android.view.View view)
      Accepts bid by calling acceptBid method in class ViewTaskActivity then closes AcceptBidFragment.
      void cancel(android.view.View view)
      Cancels accept/decline of bid by closing AcceptBidFragment.
      void decline(android.view.View view)
      Declines bid by calling declineBid method in ViewActivity, then closes AcceptBidFragment.

      TextView displaying bid amount.

      Creates the view for AcceptBidFragment's layout, then updates displayed Bid attributes with those obtained from a provided Bid object.

      Default onDetach function for fragments.

      Update fragment width to fit screen width.
